mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PS_Service (NAME, school_id, del_yn, insert_date, insert_id) VALUES (#{name},#{schoolId}, 'N', SYSDATE(), #{insertId});
mapper.delete: UPDATE PS_Service SET del_yn = 'Y',update_id = #{updateId}, update_date = SYSDATE() WHERE ID = #{id} and del_yn='N';
mapper.select: SELECT S.*,(Select name from PS_School SL where S.school_id=SL.id AND del_yn='N') AS schoolName FROM PS_Service S WHERE S.ID = #{id} AND S.del_yn='N';
